Text.Page:
Captain Liska wants more data, which means more research.

I need attar stones from {@LinkCreature:21#3#vicious orisks}. Bring them to me and I'll do what I can.
Your able and willing nature is a real boon to us all. Take this, and my thanks.
I hate to impose on you, but Liska's insistent and there's no one else who can do it. Please, I beg you, hurry.
